content.name: Back to the Future The Musical

primaryPhoto.description:
Nominated for two WhatsOnStage Awards 2024, including Best West End Show
Olivier Award Winning musical BACK TO THE FUTURE is currently wowing audiences at London’s Adelphi Theatre.
Adapting the iconic story BACK TO THE FUTURE for the stage are the movie’s creators Bob Gale and Robert Zemeckis. As well as original music by multi-Grammy Award winners Alan Silvestri and Glen Ballard, the show features timeless songs from the movie including The Power of Love, Johnny B Goode, and Back in Time.
Directed by Tony Award winner John Rando, the arrival of this plutonium-powered production means one thing’s for sure: musical theatre will never be the same again!
Book your BACK TO THE FUTURE THE MUSICAL theatre tickets with LOVEtheatre today!
